sources.title: Overland Mail (1942) LON CHANEY JR üçï15-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 15-chapter Cliffhanger!
Starring: Lon Chaney Jr., Helen Parish, Noah Beery Jr.
Directors:  Ford Beebe & John Rawlins

In this hard-riding Universal serial, two investigators are assigned to discover why the company's stagecoaches keep being ambushed.

üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00       PizzaFLIX Intro
01:09     CHAPTER 1:  A Race with Disaster
27:23     CHAPTER 2:  Flaming Havoc
46:31     CHAPTER 3:  The Menacing Herd
1:04:02  CHAPTER 4:  The Bridge of Disaster
1:22:44  CHAPTER 5:  Hurled to the Depths
1:40:23  CHAPTER 6:  Death at the Stake
1:58:47  CHAPTER 7:  The Path of Peril
2:16:03  CHAPTER 8:  Imprisoned in Flames
2:34:56  CHAPTER 9:  Hidden Danger
2:53:15  CHAPTER 10: Blazing Wagons
3:12:23  CHAPTER 11: The Trail of Terror
3:31:31  CHAPTER 12: In the Claws of the Cougar
3:49:47  CHAPTER 13: The Frenzied Mob
4:06:29  CHAPTER 14: The Toll of Treachery
4:23:49  CHAPTER 15: The Mail Goes Through
4:42:17  Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: Government agents Jim Lane and Sierra Pete are sent to investigate the breakdown of the U.S. Mail delivery in the La Paz country, which is carried by the Overland Company operated by Tom Gilbert and his daughter Barbara. Aided by their friend, Buckskin Bill Burke, they discover that Frank Chadwick, using white renegades disguised as Indians, is behind the trouble as he wants the mail franchise owned by Gilbert's stage line.
metadata.Writer: Paul Huston, George H. Plympton, Griffin Jay
metadata.Actors: Lon Chaney Jr., Helen Parrish, Noah Beery Jr.
